WorkItem.Description:
Hello all
I want to set the position of keyboard througth paramaters any idea could help me ?

Comments.Message:
Hi, 

You can use the positioning from Popups:
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb613596.aspx#Positioning

In this link everything is explained very well. You can see what PlacementTarget means, and how to place the keyboard around a placementtarget. 

Kind regards,
Thank you very useful the link
I have another question can i add an image for example in the keypad how can i add one image for the numer 1,2,3, ect. or any idea ?
